DescriptionData.Title: Kryvaline 12 Color Palette - Regular (10 g)
DescriptionData.Description: Kryvaline Palettes contain an assortment of popular colors and are perfect for face painters on the go. Kryvaline Face Paints are strongly pigmented, wax-based makeup perfect for adults and children alike. Kryvaline blends in easily and stays soft on skin. Kryvaline is free of any harmful ingredients and can be used on sensitive skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes colors: White, Orange, Red, Light Blue, Purple, Blue, Yellow, Pale Pink, Lime Green, Dark Green, Dark Brown, Black
Strongly pigmented and rich in color
Colors come arranged in fixed round containers
Vegan and not tested on animals
